backend/main.mo: Defines data types and comparison functions for posts, job posts, messages, and coach profiles, and initializes maps for social features, storage, authorization, and follow relations.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping UI requirements to specific frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of major frontend files, explaining their purpose and recent updates such as attachment handling, styling, and component behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base style definitions including OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global component styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React application into the root container.
frontend/PARITY_CHECKLIST.md: Documentation checklist verifying that the frontend matches the live XOROOTS branding, styling, responsiveness, and asset usage.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication flow, theme provider, conditional rendering of header/dashboard, and displaying the profile setup modal with timeout logic.
frontend/src/components/AdminBadge.tsx: Renders a red destructive-style admin badge with an icon for marking administrator users.
frontend/src/components/AdminBanner.tsx: Displays a dismissible admin-only alert banner for new reports, with periodic polling for updates.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedScr: Renders the scrolling XOROOTS logo background layer for authenticated pages using the centralized branding asset.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Renders a brand logo image with size options and falls back to text if the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/CoachDirectory.t: Displays a searchable list of coach profiles with follow, admin, and delete actions.
frontend/src/components/CoachProfileDeta: Modal showing detailed coach info with follow/unfollow, post/job deletion, and account removal options.
frontend/src/components/EditPostModal.ts: Modal for editing a postâ€™s content and attachments with support for adding or removing files.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai with dynamic hostname tagging.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with logo, theme toggle, profile menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/ImageCropper.tsx: Empty component placeholder for future image cropping functionality.
frontend/src/components/JobBoard.tsx: Job board for posting, viewing, applying, and deleting coaching-related job listings.
frontend/src/components/MessagingHub.tsx: Provides a connections list and chat UI, fetching profiles and messages and allowing sending direct messages.
frontend/src/components/MyProfile.tsx: Displays and edits the user's profile including photo, bio, roles, and positions with update and preview logic.
frontend/src/components/PostAttachmentRe: Renders post attachments with type detection, inline previews, fallback handling, and download support.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for initial profile creation, handling photo upload, positions, roles, and saving data to the backend.
frontend/src/components/SocialFeed.tsx: Implements the social feed with posting, sorting, liking, commenting, attachments, and profile lookups.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Defines centralized branding constants for the app name and logo.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, with auto-invalidation of dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating profiles, photos, and related backend data using the actor and identity context.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS base styles, theme variables, and a scrolling logo background for authenticated views.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main authenticated dashboard with tabbed navigation for feed, coaches, jobs, messages, and profile.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the public landing page with hero content, features, and login button using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/utils/attachmentTypes.ts: Utility helpers to detect if file attachments are videos, PDFs, or images based on MIME type and filename.
frontend/src/utils/blobMime.ts: Provides MIME type inference from file extensions and ensures valid MIME types for files.
frontend/src/utils/downloadAttachment.ts: Downloads an attachment by fetching bytes, constructing a Blob with inferred MIME type, and triggering a browser download.
frontend/src/utils/imageBlobUrl.ts: Provides a utility to create an image URL from an ExternalBlob with fallback to Blob URLs and a React hook to manage loading and cleanup.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Implements helpers for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and removing or persisting them across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, spacing, typography, container settings, and animations for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes project state and requirements for placing and using XOROOTS logo assets in the UI and background.
